articles.title: Pestilence
articles.body:
Documented Big Epidemics. .. (Noticeably High Death Tolls)
----------------------------------------------------

    • 430BC Typhus/Typhoid (Athens, etc.)
    • 180 Smallpox (Rome)
    • 250 Smallpox (Europe)
    • 541-549 Bubonic Plague (Eurasia)
    • 735 Smallpox (Japan)
    • 1350 Bubonic Plague (Eurasia)
    • 1510 Influenza (Eurasia)
    • 1520 Smallpox (mexico)
    • 1557 Influenza (Eurasia & americas)
    • 1561 Smallpox (chile)
    • 1576 Salmonella (Mexico)
    • 1580-1603 Bubonic Plague (europe)
    • 1630 Bubonic Plague (italy)
    • 1630-1680 Bubonic Plague (europe, china)
    • 1708 Smallpox (iceland)
    • 1710 Bubonic Plague (scandinavia)
    • 1720 Bubonic Plague (france)
    • 1735 Diptheria (america)
    • 1738 Bubonic Plague (balkans)
    • 1741 Yellow Fever (Colombia)
    • 1743 Bubonic Plague (italy)
    • 1770 Bubonic Plague (russia)
    • 1772 Bubonic Plague (persia)
    • 1789 Smallpox (australia)
    • 1800 Yellow Fever (spain)
    • 1802 Yellow Fever (haiti)
    • 1812 Typhus (russia)
    • 1812 Bubonic Plague (ottomans, romania)
    • 1817 Typhus (ireland)
    • 1817-1824 Cholera (eurasia)
    • 1826-1837 Cholera (eurasia + n. america)
    • 1829-1833 Malaria (pnw)
    • 1846-1860 Cholera (worldwide)
    • 1861-1865 Typhoid (US)
    • 1863-1875 Cholera (middle east)
    • 1871 Yellow Fever (argentina)
    • 1870 Smallpox (europe)
    • 1881-1896 Cholera (world)
    • 1890 Flu/Covid (world)
    • 1896-1906 African Trypanosomiasis (congo)
    • 1889-1923 Cholera (world)
    • 1900-1920 African Trypanosomiasis (uganda)
    • 1915-1926 Encephalitis (world)
    • 1918-1920 Influenza-H1N1 (world)
    • 1918-1922 Typhus (russia)
    • 1957 Influenza-H2N2 (world)
    • 1968-1970 Influenza-H3N2 (world)
    • 1977-1979 Influenza-H1N1 (world)
    • 1981-... HIV/AIDS (world)
    • 2009-2010 Influenza-H1N1 (world)
    • 2013-2016 Ebola (west africa)
    • 2019-... SARS-CoV-2 (world)

    1700s = Bubo, 1800s = Cholera, 1900s = Influenza, 2000s = ...
articles.summary: How the world came to be
